articles.content: Its not easy flushing hundreds of hours of video game progress down the drain, but scores of cowboys are doing just that. Players are leaving theirRed Dead Online accounts behind on consoles in order… [+4903 chars]

articles.title: How to Move the Taskbar to the Top of Your Screen on Windows 10 - How-To Geek
articles.description: If you’re the kind of Windows 10 user that likes to spice things up, why not move your taskbar to a new location—like the top of your screen? Once there, it works just as you would expect it to, including the Start menu. It’s also a great party trick. Here’s …

articles.title: LG introduces new Gram laptops with up to 19.5 hours of battery power - Android Authority
articles.description: All the new thin-and-light Gram laptops feature Intel's 11th-Gen Core processors and 16:10 displays.
articles.content:
• LG has introduced five new Gram series laptops.
  • All the laptops feature Intel 11th-Gen Core CPUs and 16:10 displays.
  • Three of them promise up to 19.5 hours of battery power.
